#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>

using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;

ll gcd(ll s, ll l)
{
if(l%s==0)return s;
return gcd(l%s,s);
}








int main()
{
ll t,x1,x2,y1,y2,dx,dy;
cin>>t;
while(t--)
{
    cin>>x1>>y1>>x2>>y2;
    dx=abs(x2-x1);
    dy=abs(y2-y1);
    if(dx==0||dy==0)
        cout<<"0\n";
    else
    {   ll g=gcd(min(dx,dy),max(dx,dy));
        cout<<(dx+dy-g)<<"\n";
    }
}

return 0;
}
